document.title: Technical Bulletins: Potential Firefighter Schedules Beginning Jan. 1, 1975
document.abstract: The following analysis was prepared by William Danielson for the National League of Cities to show possible firefighter schedules permissible (without necessitating overtime payment) under the Fair Labor Standards Act Amendments for the next four years.
